 == <a href="http://www.getslimstack.net/">SLiM Stack</a>: SLiM stands for Scala + Lift + MongoDB ==

SLiM is the fastest and easiest way to get started on Windows with these technologies. 


 == <a href="http://lostprofile.de/pamp.pre.dmg.zip">PAMP</a>: integrated environment on Mac OS X ==

PAMP MUST be copied to the Applications folder to work! The password promt pops up due to required root privileges for port 80 (all ports < 1024 require root access).

PS: Apache as well as PHP are compiled with the minimal amount of modules and extensions to work!
